page.title: 11Children's Day in Crediton
page.content: This year there was a{children's day in{Newcombe's Meadow,}which is a park. It was the first one of what the organisers hope will be many. It was {organised by}my mum and several of her friends. We had inflatables, trampolines, stalls and a theatre. Next year they hope to have more inflatables and fewer adult things . The{money}that was raised went to {Ethiopia}and{children's charities. They raised about{Â£400}altogether. It was held on the{May Day}Bank Holiday because everyone had a day off school and work. I hope there will be many more because it was{fun}for everyone and the money went to a good cause.
